brand_identity.name: JobNexus
brand_identity.emotional_tone: Professional but not cold. Trustworthy but modern.

theme_strategy.rationale: Light mode builds trust and readability for long reading sessions (job descriptions). Dark mode appeals to the developer/tech audience.

usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope for all H1-H6. Weight: Bold (700) or ExtraBold (800) for H1/H2. Letter-spacing: tight (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: Use Inter for all paragraphs and UI text. Weight: Regular (400) or Medium (500). Relaxed line-height (1.6).
usage_rules.buttons: Manrope, Semibold (600). Uppercase optional for small tags.

primary.name: Electric Indigo
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key brand elements. NOT for backgrounds.

layout_system.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Avoid cramped p-2 or p-4 for main containers.

bento_grid.description: Use for Landing Page categories and Dashboard summaries.
rules: Spans: Feature items span 2 cols. Hero items span 2 rows.

dashboard_layout.card_style: Flat, 1px border (border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800), no shadow by default. Hover: shadow-md.

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-600 text-white hover:bg-indigo-700 shadow-sm rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-semibold transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 rounded-xl p-6

inputs.base: h-11 rounded-md border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-indigo-600

hero_office.alt: Top view of modern office team collaboration
hero_office.usage: Landing page hero or 'About Us' section

remote_work.alt: Two people working at a table
remote_work.usage: Remote work category or blog section

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent size (w-5 h-5 for UI, w-6 h-6 for nav).

anti_patterns: NO centered text for long paragraphs.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-600 or darker on white. Slate-400 or lighter on dark.
accessibility.focus: All interactive elements must have visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-indigo-600).
accessibility.testing: Use data-testid on all buttons and inputs.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Electric Indigo' and 'Slate' palette.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar/Header structure for dashboards.
4. Use the provided image URLs for the Landing Page.
5. Ensure all Shadcn components (Buttons, Cards, Inputs) are styled to match the 'Soft Utility' archetype (rounded-md, flat borders).
6. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the Job Categories section on the landing page.
